para.text: This function aim to check the dv/dt latch value of under-voltage protection.
In the dv/dt latch test, if dv/dt value greater than the slips setting of the protection relay, the relay will latched and not permitted for action.

The process of this test is that when the test is started, the protection is in the permitted action status, and then the dv/dt value is adjusted to greater than the slips latch value, while the protection is in the latched status, and the action is not allowed, at this time, the currently dv/dt value is recorded.

para.text: Defined the initial voltage on each steps start. Usually is set to Vnom.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Defined the start dv/dt slip value. This value have to less than dv/dt latch value of the protection relay.
Defined the destination dv/dt slip value. This value have to greater than dv/dt latch value of the protection relay.
Defined the ramping step dv/dt value from start dv/dt to destination dv/dt. Reduce this value can increase the accuracy of test result.
